meanings.definition: Swifter (noun): A type of cleaning tool used to sweep floors.
meanings.sent1: I used the swifters to clean the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent2: Mom bought new swifters to help with the house chores.
meanings.sent3: The swifters danced across the floor, collecting dust with ease.
meanings.sent4: Her swifters were like magic wands, making the room spotless in no time.
meanings.sent5: The swifters glided effortlessly, leaving a trail of cleanliness behind.

meanings.definition: Swifter (adjective): Moving or capable of moving quickly.
meanings.sent1: The cheetah is one of the swiftest animals in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: She ran with swifter speed than anyone else in the race.
meanings.sent3: The swifter wind blew the leaves off the trees in a hurry.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to pass in a swifter manner when she was having fun.
meanings.sent5: His swifter reflexes allowed him to dodge the ball effortlessly.
